website_summaries.verdict: A flexible, stackable tray that's ideal for freezing homemade baby food.
pros: Flexible silicone tray with lid included
Easy to pop food out of the tray once it's been prepared, even after freezing
cons: Some have complained that the tray has a strong plastic smell when it first arrives

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Pass "Pinch" Test
customer_reviews.text: I wish we could keep this...it is easy to use and super easy to "pop" the frozen food out The reason I'm sending it back is that this product does NOT pass the "pinch test" (twist or pinch the silicone, and it turns white). This means that this product does not use 100% food grade silicone, but instead uses plastic fillers as well as silicone. I don't want to take the chance of chemicals leeching into my baby's food, so this will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Aarin Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE! NOT 100% SILICONE LIKE THEY CLAIM!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in these. I bought one from Amazon and one from their actual website. I wanted somthing safe to put my sons baby food in and these are made with fillers. They claim to be all silicone but as you can see by the pictures they are not. Why are so many companies lying about what their products are made of? It's so hard to find something that is 100% silicone to put his food in. Such a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for freezing baby food!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for freezing batches of baby food! One tray of frozen food will fit perfectly in a quart size baggie. I only bought four little glass containers to use for travel, otherwise the bags are an easy way to store the food. No need to buy baby bullet, just use your blender or food processor and store easily this way.
customer_reviews.author: organic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for freezing chicken broth and the like into portions. I fell in love with this method after freezing baby food. They trays seem to be of good quality, they are just smaller than I expected. UPDATE: 4/19/2018 The frozen cubes are much easier to get out of this tray than other larger trays. I was concerned about the 1.5 oz portion being too small, but it is actually just right Would definitely buy these again, and probably will!
customer_reviews.author: CBU

customer_reviews.title: Worst smell I've ever smelled
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I would love this tray but there is a horrible smell coming from the tray. It seriously smells so bad that even hours later I can still taste the smell and it makes me gag. tried washig it multiple times and if anything, the smell had gotten worse not better. I don't feel safe freezing my babys food in it. I regret this purchase and will be looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Norris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love these trays! I have two of them which I originally meant to use for fruits and veggies, but now just use for whatever. They’re so easy to use, very durable, and simple to get the frozen food out (I just pop them inside out). Cleaning them is a snap. I have used them for all different colors of food and they always come perfectly clean. They’re dishwasher safe too! I love these so much I bought a bunch of other items by the same company. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janet I.

customer_reviews.title: So nice to have! A necessity for the at home baby food chef!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a really handy thing to have when you make your baby’s food. It’s easy to pop out food after it’s been frozen, and I even found out that there’s a label on the inside of each mould that says 1oz-30ml My only complain would be I wish the lid stayed on better and the sections were at least 2oz. That and I wish the price was a little lower. Otherwise, I would 100% recommend this product to anyone who asked.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Food Storage
customer_reviews.text: I have bought (3) of these because I love them so much! I make my own baby food, and I like to make batches in bulk then freeze it. These are much better than a lot of other silicone freezer storage trays. Getting the frozen food out of the pockets is a breeze and the portion size is perfect! The lid fits tightly on top, even with taking it off and on a few times a day. I highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: KLP

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: We love these freezer trays! I had very high hopes for these so I bought 3 of them and prayed I wouldn't regret it. They are awesome! 100% worth it and would recommend to anyone who is making their babys food to freeze. I typically make the baby food, freeze it then once frozen, combine all of the frozen cubes into one ziplock. This way I can wash and reuse my trays! These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small portion size **Amazing Company**
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** I just wanted to update my review from 3 stars to 5 stars due to the AMAZING customer service I received from WeeSprout after my original review. This company is amazing to work with and I can't wait for them to expand their product line so I can order more stuff from them! --Original Review-- These (red in picture) are small compared to the original storage tray I had from Baby Bullet (beige). I have to use 2 for each feeding. Other than that, I like the ease of popping out the frozen purees, just wish they were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wilmes

customer_reviews.title: Good tray, could be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to freeze breast milk in. I fill up each hole almost to the top and then freeze for a day. Once frozen I pop them out into a freezer safe bag. It’s nice for younger babies if you only need a few ounces as opposed to thawing a whole 5 or 6 ounce bag. It didn’t have any odors when I took it out of the package. Cleans just fine in too dishwasher rack. I do find the cubes can be a little difficult to pop out once frozen.
customer_reviews.author: JoeNGina

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy! I had previously purchased another brand that was less in price and ended up wasting my money. I saw this and should have purchased it to begin with. The material is thick and sturdy yet soft enough to allow you to more easily remove baby food once frozen. That was the real test- which this tray passed. I have made and frozen butternut squash, sweet potato, and green beans so far and all has held up well and even with the sweet potatoes, there were no stains left behind. I am definitely buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: W.M.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Homemade Baby Food
customer_reviews.text: This tray makes freezing homemade baby food so easy. The portion sizes are perfect, it's super easy to wash and the silicone portions are easy to pop out. Since the portions are small, I can freeze foods quickly and keep a wide variety of foods in the freezer (sorted in labeled plastic baggies) for easy meal planning.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great portion size
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to clean. It does have some flaws but overall I do like it. When I received it the mold did carry a scent and I washed it thoroughly. I also let it air out a bit and the helped as well. I like the portion size because I can mix it with other purées. I did leave this in the freezer for two days and it had very little ice. But I did notice that the mold holds on to the scent of the purée. I am letting it air out before I use it again. Hopefully that will work!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It's the right size for me. Stored a lot of vegetable puree for future cooking and transferred them to an air right container. I can now easily pick a few of these chunks and use it for cooking. They don't stick together and even after 2 months they been good. Sometimes when food didn't come off from tray I would close the lid, turn it upside down and run it under tap water for a min. That did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying two of these to help with making homemade baby food! So far they've been awesome with no issues with sticking. I just run a little hot water on the back of them to release the food and it works perfectly! And I really love the hard lid because it makes them very sturdy in the freezer even on top of other things. I just wish silicone didn't absorb smells, but that is not this product's fault. I'd rather use this in plastic!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great size, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my baby bullet and the size is great for my 6 month old, who is starting solids. We can pack and freeze so much food each weekend, it's great! Looking back, I should've started earlier in the summer season to get the most out id the fruits and veggies that are in season now. I can pop these out and stick them in the candy bullet cups to take to daycare. The stiffness of the material and the lid both work well when transporting and freezing liquidy foods. It's also easy to pop the food out of the molds. Clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Aleeega

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I boiled it before first use because some people wrote there was an odor, even though I didn’t notice one. Now I throw it in the dishwasher each time and it comes out clean. The frozen portions pop out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M

customer_reviews.title: Easy pop out! Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my own baby food for a few months now. I’ve tried SEVERAL brands of ice cube trays. They all require a little thaw time before you can pop out the frozen food. Not this one. It’s easily the best I’ve used! Right out of the freezer and they pop out immediately. I bought 2 more after the first time I tried this one. Kudos! And they fit perfectly into the little cups with lids sold by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Smells Weird and Leaches into Ice Cubes
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this...I ignored all the reviews that said it had a weird smell/made ice cubes taste funny but I should have listened. The reviews are true. The silicone smells like plastic even after thorough cleaning and it leaches into ice cubes. I’m glad I didn’t waste any breast milk in this tray because it would have needed to be discarded. I ordered a mild from Haakaa and am hoping that one is better.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Nice baby food storage
customer_reviews.text: These storage trays are great for portioning baby food and freezing them. My only complaint is that the lid doesn’t secure truly as the mold starts to bend slightly when filled. This allows for some freezer burn to occur on the baby food over time. I still recommend these, but be weary if freezing/storing food for excess periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Karamelia Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lovely company
customer_reviews.text: We just put the first batch of Avacado food in the freezer, and they came out great. I love that they’re the correct portion size, and the lid is very secure to keep it all fresh! Great product, and I appreciate their follow up email to make sure we received it and that it was what we expected :) definitely recommend if you’re going to be making your own baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Sinead

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad and poor lid
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but after a couple weeks of using it started to have a very strange smell. And the lid doesn’t seem to clip on very securely which made me unsure of leaving breastmilk in the freezer in it.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Freezing Baby Food!
customer_reviews.text: Quality trays. Great for freezing home made baby food! Very easy to use & clean. Each sections are 1.5 ounce with a fill line indicator for 1.0 ounce which is perfect for single serving or to mix different food. I bought a few trays & all came nicely packaged. I highly recommend these freezer trays from this company!
customer_reviews.author: hammy sandwich

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pop up
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good quality wise. The lid fits tightly. But the portions are very big. Its almost 3 tbs. I thaw each of them in refrigerator and use for 2 days (my baby is 6 months old and just started solid). Also because of the shape you can not loosen up multiple together, and its quite difficult to pop up individually, they sit very tightly. I have another one while more like silicon ice cube tray, compare to this, that works much better.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making baby food and freezing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little tray. It works so well for making baby food. I have used it time and time again to make all sorts of purees. The tray has convenient 1oz markers in each compartment and food releases easily from it. Dishwasher safe and hasn't warped. My favorite thing about the tray is that the little cubes that come out of it fit perfectly into the hole of glass baby food jars. This was perfect for me, as I usually bought one small jar of food to see if little one liked it, then I would make a batch and use the jar to defrost and store a cube until it was time to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Randon Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love. Love.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I bought it to be environmentally friendly verses the plastic baggies. I love the purple color. I love that the kid clips on in a sense (see picture). I love that it tells you where an ounce is so you know how much to pour (also see pictures). Sinxe it's an ounce you know how many to pull out for your bottle. I.e. if it's a four ounce bottle you need four cubes. It's a sturdy silicone so once you pop the lid on it's easy to carry to the freezer without sloshing it around or worrying about spilling. Considering buying another simply because it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis W.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I make and batch freeze my own raw cat food, and this is exactly what I was looking for to freeze portion sizes without using hard-to-clean vacuum bags while also avoiding freezer burn. I may order a few more so I can batch freeze an entire month or more at a time. So happy that I can fully sanitize these in a dishwasher unlike vacuum bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Blair

customer_reviews.title: Makes Baby Food Making Easy-Peasy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tray to make homemade baby food for my 4 month old and I love it! I have been making veggies in my Instapot, grinding up in my Nutribullet & then freezing in the tray. The cubes pop out super easy. Once frozen, I put cubes in Ziplock baggies and label! The lid attaches nicely as well which makes it nice to stack more than one tray. Will probably buy more to make my life a little easier! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mathewson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for many frozen utems
customer_reviews.text: Loved it . Easy to use . No bad smell for me . Convenient for my garlic and ginger freshly chopped and grinded samples . Came on time . Loved the idea !
customer_reviews.author: moyra

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the design, but it smells terrible... I’ve used it twice for breast milk and I’m afraid my milk is going to smell like the tray. I washed before use and even boiled it to sanitize, but it’s still got that smell and now I’m stuck with a product I don’t feel comfortable using. Wish I would have listened to the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Great item but a bit small for my 6 month old. She's eating 3oz right now so I'd need three of these little suckers to fill her up. My mistake though I Thought it would've been good enough. Also, it doesn't smell or anything. I threw them in boiling water for three minutes prior to first use and they haven't smelled since
customer_reviews.author: StraightBack

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Healthy For Your Baby
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dad and these little trays are terrific. Just take fruits or veggies and wash them. Then boil them if needed and throw them in your chopper/blender. Puree them for younger babies or chop them up for toddlers and poof - meals for a week! It takes 10-15 minutes to make fresh meals for your baby you can freeze. It's great to know the food I'm giving my kids is healthy and that I made it myself. Common foods include baby carrots, Fuji apples, blueberries, mixed vegetables, and sweet potatoes. The portion sizes are great and the food pops right out when needed. We have a fruit tray and a vegetable tray. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ACinKC

customer_reviews.title: Already ordered another!
customer_reviews.text: This freezer tray is exactly what I was looking for. We are just beginning to introduce pureed foods, and I've decided I want to make as much of baby's food as possible. After receiving and washing the freezer tray, I did not notice any odd odors. The tray was easy to fill with my first puree, the lid snapped on securely, and into the freezer it went. Once frozen, the food came out easily with a little push from the bottom. I've already ordered another tray and would recommend to anyone wanting to make their own baby food as well.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product !!! It’s exactly what I was looking for ! Super easy to clean the food pops right out !!! The portion sizes don’t bother as of now my baby girl is just starting out on solids !! I do plan on buying another one! I was worried about the food having a chemical smell/taste as I read in some other reviews however I have not had that problem !!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the product, so much that this was my second purchase. I love the quality, it's very easy to remove the food from each container. The lid is easy to remove also. I read in some reviews that they complaint about getting ice inside of the container, I didn't experience this but I filled the container to the top and don't leave the food inside it for long (since it's not an airtight container). In any case this container is not for long storage, just to freeze the food. In my case, I freeze my baby's food and then store it in a glass container in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Homemade Food Fresh for Baby
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to use, and fun. Making your own baby food is the way to go! Less processed and no added preservatives. I made beef stew, lentils, berry mix, squash, and peas/carrots. I froze it, popped the little pods out and ziploc freezer bag. It’s so easy for my husband to feed the baby... it’s all right there ready to go. Happy eating!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trays for freezing purees
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They're expensive, but I tried going cheaper with one of the ones that look like a plastic ice tray and it was much harder to get the frozen cubes out; plus those were only 1 ounce, which quickly gets too small, and it's great how with these, you can fill them up to make 1.5 ounces or use the 1 ounce line if your baby isn't eating quite as much. It's very easy to pop out the frozen cubes, and they stack well in the freezer and don't leak. I purchased a second for the days when I go puree crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Best baby food tray out there - hands down.
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than any of the other trays I inherited from my sisters after their kids outgrew baby food. I did not appreciate how easy this is to use until I saw what else was out there! You can just pop the frozen food out easily without all the "digging" from the other trays. Very easy to clean with a simple rinse in the sink and I put on the top shelf of my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great to freezing breast milk, avoiding plastic
customer_reviews.text: Using this to freeze my breast milk in 1-1.5 ounce pieces so it's easy to choose how much to unfreeze and not waste. Also I wanted to avoid having to heat breast milk in plastic. I transfer the breast milk to lansinoh bags after freezing in this, then when I want to use some frozen milk I pull out the right number of cubes and put them in a glass baby bottle in fridge to thaw. I'm not sure they would fit down e neck of a standard neck bottle? They fit easily down my wide neck Avent glass bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Belhumeur

customer_reviews.title: Super Good for Baby Food
customer_reviews.text: These have been a life saver for our family. These are so quick and easy to use. All types of food just slide right out of them and they never stain. Beets or Carrots always wash clean to their original color. I would suggest that you buy wide food containers for thawing. If you use a full pod it is hard to fit two into a lot of containers.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Fits in baby bullet dial date containers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a baby food tray that could fit in the baby bullet dial date containers. These fit no problem. The silicone is very flexible so the food comes out easily. It’s actually easier to get food out of than the baby bullet trays. I also love that the recommended cleaning method is in the dishwasher. This makes it very easy to get really clean.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: My little one just started solids and I needed something to freeze portions for later use. I searched and came across this silicone baby food freezer tray from wee sprouts. It worked perfectly and froze the perfect portions. Once frozen, I gently pressed on the bottom and popped the portions out and placed into a freezer bag, so I could use the tray for my next solid purée. I definitely recommend this product for anyone making their own baby food. I will most likely be ordering a second one so that I can make a larger batch for freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Made all of my son's baby food with one of these and a ninja blender. I highly recommend this. Very easy to use and dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: sepk

customer_reviews.title: It smells!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these to freeze breast milk. But the other reviews are right, it has a very strong plastic smell even after washing. Returning them and switching to glass jars.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone making baby food at home.
customer_reviews.text: These are so great for homemade purées. We bought three of them so we could freeze multiple purées at the same time. Easy to pop a large batch of baby food in these freeze them overnight. We are saving so much money making our own purées!
customer_reviews.author: Fidel Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Great molds!
customer_reviews.text: This was very handy for making baby food, easy to wash, come with a lid which is super helpful, and it was easy to pop the little portions out! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Zahn

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: If you are making your own baby food, you need this product. Very straightforward and easy to use. Well made. I would recommend buying 3-4 so you can make food in bulk!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these trays! The silicone is super easy to pop the food out of, and makes perfect portion sizes for my little one's food! These have made making my baby's food purees so much more convenient and cost effective!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Eiden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portion size
customer_reviews.text: We got this freezer tray for making homemade baby food. It is exactly what we needed. The portion sizes are perfect- Each spot is 1.5 ounces with a line within them for 1 ounce portions. The food is easily removable, and after having it for over a month, have had no issues with damage. It seems like a sturdy, easy to use freezer tray. We are buying another one now!
customer_reviews.author: GrimnirDad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our baby’s first purées! The 1oz portions are great to pop in the fridge and thaw for the afternoon snack for our 5 month old. Easy to remove food after freezing & easy to clean on the top shelf of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I actually use them to freeze extra sauces like pesto, chipotle sauce, etc. that I make and never finish. We freeze the extra, pop them into zip lock bags and use them at a later date. We also have our first child on the way and I am so excited to try baby food and pops in these.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing for meal prepping for a child. The portion size is too small so we use two at a time but it’s easy to remove the portions even while holding a child on your hip with one arm and assembling their food with the other.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Makes life so much easier and I can feel confident my baby is getting what he’s needs
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Just starting to feed my little one solid food and am very aware what goes into his food. This is an excellent way to store food and have easy access for healthy home cooked meals
customer_reviews.author: Susan warren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but the smell is concerning
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can freeze my breast milk in one oz portions, and these are super easy to remove the frozen cubes. I do have a major concern, though. There is a strong, off-putting smell on the tray that is worse when I wash it in hot water. I thought it would get better over time, but a month after starting to use it and washing daily, the smell is still as strong as ever. I came on here to read more reviews to see if others had this issue, and now I’m concerned my frozen milk is ruined! Will have to thaw some to test.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ... purchasing the WeeSprout pouches for baby food and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with a coupon code when purchasing the WeeSprout pouches for baby food and I'm glad I did. This thing has a lot of small spaces for purees and, turns out that can be a good thing. I used this to portion out new foods which might get refused a few times, without wasting as much as putting them in the bigger pods. Food can go in hot because its silicone and pops out easily when frozen. Tray stacks nice with other trays as well. Pleasantly surprised by this product. It is a little thinner than the Beaba version, but it still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Cara NormanTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Decent but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Definitely overpriced. I found another brand at Target for half the price, the portion sizes a bigger, & the lid fits better. If these were cheaper, I might buy more, but I'll stick with the NUK ones.
customer_reviews.author: cnstewart1182

customer_reviews.title: not flexible
customer_reviews.text: this container would have been perfect except for the fact that it was not flexible silicone so we couldn't just pop out the filling...it was super cute & I wish we could have used it...pretty color...
customer_reviews.author: clapton

customer_reviews.title: For easy homemade baby food storage
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and convenience. I measure about 2 tablespoons of pureed food for my little for each freezer cup. This has plenty of room and works perfectly for homemade baby food. Once frozen, the soft silicone makes it easy to remove the frozen cubes and store your baby food or you can leave it in the tray, which comes with a plastic cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this tray! High quality, safe, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Having a healthy, safe, toxin-free frozen food tray is important to my family. After asking the company if the product is BPS-free in addition BPA, PVC, lead, and Phthalate-free, and receiving a prompt response, I knew this was the product for us. My little one is 6 months old and we wanted to start introducing solids. I have used this tray and love it! Great portion size and easy to squeeze out once frozen. I have already recommended this to my mom friends and it will be my go-to baby shower gift for future moms.
customer_reviews.author: aMum

customer_reviews.title: Using for homemade baby food.
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to fill and freeze. I got 3. We pop them out and store in ziplocks. Will be using these often. As he eats two at every feeding. We pop them in the microwave at 10-15 seconds at a time to heat them up. We love being able to give him all natural fruits and veggies, with NOTHING added.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa1106

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for, just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Love a family owned business that makes amazing products, and take the time to reach out and assure you are happy with your order. Great one ounce portions for our little one. Just click buy now.
customer_reviews.author: MissCole86

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best freezer molds for baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how wonderful these trays are. They have made our baby food making adventure so easy. They hold up great in the dishwasher, are easy to clean by hand, and definitely don't have a weird gassy or chemical smell that someone else reviewed. Once the baby food is frozen they are so easy to pop out. I have had other silicone ice cube trays that are so difficult to get out once frozen. These are completely the opposite. Pop right out with no problem! Love these and have ordered morr after my initial order.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality silicone holder
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality silicone holder. I wasn't sold on spending so much for this compared to a cheaper ice tray type of food freezer, but after using this a couple times I'm really happy I bought this. First, this holds the perfect amount of food for 1 serving. When I had ice cube sized food one was never enough but two was sometimes too big. It's also really easy to pop these out since the silicone is so flexible - several times I though the silicone would tear because its hard to get the frozen food out, but this has definitely lasted. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby portions
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portion size. Lid fits well and stays on tight; no issues with freezer burned food. It is so easy to remove food. Unlike other trays there is no need to run hot water on the bottoms to loosen them up.
customer_reviews.author: JMoh

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical scent
customer_reviews.text: These trays have the worst chemical smell it’s supposed to be used to baby food. I try to avoid anything that’s harmful and as soon as I opened it I couldn’t believe how strong the chemical smell is. I am going to try and boil the tray but I should not have to do extra steps to use this. I’m a busy mom and I’m trying to save time not add to things I have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent whitley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far i’m loving the tray!! I made my first batch ever of pureed sweet potatoes for our 6 month old and the tray was perfect for freezing. I love the measurement line on the inside of the cups. The frozen portions are also super easy to get out. I actually ordered the same tray in 4 more colors!! Thanks for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for freezing baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to test them out for my baby food and I've got to say, they were pretty perfect. The lid fit securely down over all the compartments, and they stacked nicely. When frozen, the food popped out very easily with no yucky residue, and the product was left very clean. I haven't put these in the oven or the dishwasher but for what I need they're perfect. After a week of using I decided to buy 2 more. Everything about these trays have been awesome and the company has solid customer service. Support small businesses!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Grish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this freezer tray for a variety of pureed baby foods. It has always cleaned really well with no residue or oder, and it makes lots of uniform cubes. To limit the amount of ice on the tops of the cubes, remove the cubes and store in freezer zip lock bags within 24 hours. You usually need to leave the tray out a few minutes so they cubes slip out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Works great, except.....
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but once in the freezer lid doesn’t stay on to well
customer_reviews.author: Almacubana

customer_reviews.title: Not just for baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely delighted with the WeeSprout Food Freezer Tray. I am using it to freeze portions of canned pumpkin to thaw and use occasionally in my dog's food. How to store the unused pumpkin when I opened a can was always an issue. Ice cube trays were awkward and messy. One can divides perfectly into the wells in the tray. I can easily pop out a portion to thaw, snap the lid back on the tray and back the rest go into the freezer. I also plan to use the tray for freezing portions of bone broth when I make a batch and want to have a variety of amounts available.
customer_reviews.author: berner

customer_reviews.title: One star off because mine had a small hole on ...
customer_reviews.text: One star off because mine had a small hole on the side of one of the cups. The hole appears to be an artifact of the injection molding process. Diameter was only 1mm and it didn't really impact my ability to use it for pureed food. It would have leaked if it were a true liquid. Edit: Updated to 5 stars for EXCELLENT customer service. See comments below.
customer_reviews.author: KennyG

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to wash them properly!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect and the food is easy to get out. The first set I bought I didn’t wash properly and they started to smell. Make sure to fully rinse them off and then put them on the top rack of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Carly K

customer_reviews.title: great ice cube tray - definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These ice cube trays are awesome. I like that they hold up to 1.5 oz, but also have a line for 1 oz. The frozen food pops out pretty easy (it took a few tries before I got the hang of it so it was even easier). After the first clean in the dishwasher, I always wash by hand. The tray cleans real quickly - after removing the food, I let sit in water for a minute and the food rinses out nearly completely. I should have gotten more than one!
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand first that was cheaper but I didn't like lid. WeeSprout is much much better. The colors are fun and the tray is easy to use, food easy to pop off. You can have a discount on another product of the brand if you register on their website. I will definitely buy more !!
customer_reviews.author: E. D.

customer_reviews.title: I bought 1 about a month ago to try out before buying more and I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I have received my “Nature’s Little Cubes”. In fact, this was my second order. I bought 1 about a month ago to try out before buying more and I LOVE them!!. The cubes are the perfect portion size and I love the 1oz mark. It gives me the option of smaller portions. I find that the lid stays on well and they are super easy to clean. So far every food I’ve tried has popped out very easily. For us the best feature is that the cubes aren’t made from harsh chemicals. This was important since we try to feed our daughter as much organic as possible and didn’t want to compromise her food when freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McCann

customer_reviews.title: I recently received this product and I am super happy that I decided to purchase it
customer_reviews.text: I recently received this product and I am super happy that I decided to purchase it! It works wonderfully and the lid seals perfectly! I currently use the baby bullet system to make all my sons baby food, and the cubes that this tray makes fit in the serving size bullets! I have also found it super useful to be able to mix and match different foods!
customer_reviews.author: B&E Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Better than baby bullet trays
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I home make all my son's baby food with the baby bullet and was looking for more freezing trays for when I made large batches. These are actually better than the actual baby bullet freezer trays. It has a measuring line on the inside so you don't fill them too full, the frozen baby food pops out soooo much easier than the baby bullet one does, the lid pops on quickly, and clean up is a breeze. The only thing is I wish the compartments were deeper and held more. But other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic baby food tray
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! I love the ability to process quickly and freeze, pop out and move on to another flavor or quickly wash and put away. Love they have reusable pouches to go along with the trays that fit the cubes right inside!
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: A must have for parents
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the most used baby products we purchased. I was buying organic pouches of baby food for months before I found this. It's as easy as mashing or blending different foods and freezing it for later use. I put mine in containers in the freezer after they have hardened in the silicone tray and just microwave them for approximately 30 seconds then serve with a spoon or put into a reusable pouch. It will be a must have on my lists to new parents!
customer_reviews.author: RubberDucky

customer_reviews.title: Simple Product...Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great. It is exactly as pictured but when I received mine the box was not sealed at all and the item appeared to have debris in the box like dirt from transit in the mail system I suppose. I recommend not only washing before use but sanitizing in boiling water just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Functional Throughout Baby's First Year
customer_reviews.text: I used this briefly, while I struggled to breastfeed. I use it a lot now that I make my baby's food. It holds a solid serving for early eating stages and I can easily combine a couple now that she is eating larger portions. I've run it through the dishwasher without any issue. I wish it had more spots/cubes, but other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Lolla Belle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little smaller portion sizes than others I have seen but I like them because then I can use more than one frozen fruit or veggies to mix together for a meal for my baby. Gives me a chance to feed my baby more of a variety of different combinations of foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Homemade baby food made easy
customer_reviews.text: Great for making homemade baby food. I like how easily portions pop out of the silicone trays. Also just the perfect size for a baby starting out on solids. Once he progresses I'll fill to the top and use multiple cubes per meal. The lid on these trays makes a huge difference fitting multiple in the freezer. Worth the little extra over a basic ice cube tray
customer_reviews.author: FSshopper85

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! I love this product, I was looking for ice trays for aloe ice cubes but I found this one with the lid, it’s better than ice trays! perfect size! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: traces

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I wish the portion sizes were just a little bigger but at the same time, it’s fine. Great quality, beautiful color, easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time and I am in LOVE! I make my own baby food and I didn't like the though of using ice cube trays. Each spot has a line to tell you exactly where 1oz is. It's easy to fill with a regular spoon. The clear plastic lid makes it easy to store in the fridge/freezer, and I am still able to put other things on top of it. The food comes out super easily and without a huge mess. I am going to buy a couple more so I have a stock of baby food ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: MomofboysTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and perfect portions!
customer_reviews.text: Now that baby is old enough for solids I have been making our own baby food and freezing it in this tray. Once it's frozen I pop out the perfect size portions and place them into freezer bags so I can then reuse the tray to make more food as necessary. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: JBLAKE

customer_reviews.title: Will not put food in these. Potentially harmful.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that these trays smell horrible. I will not put baby food in a product that off gases a spray paint-like odor. I was so hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and portion size is good
customer_reviews.text: Gift at Christmas for baby granddaughter’s food. Mama liked it and said it’s easy to use to freeze homemade baby food. She said it’s easy to remove the food and the portion size is good.
customer_reviews.author: TheRose

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell! Can't imagine how can othe people can ...
customer_reviews.text: If I can gave Zero star, I would! Terrible smell! Can't imagine how can othe people can use it to store food for baby????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I make all of my baby’a food from scratch and these trays make it easy. I bought them in every color! I love freezing food in these as opposed to jars because it allows me to make many different ingredient combinations to keep things interesting for my little guy. They are great quality and have held up to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: MultitaskingManhattanMama

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to make my baby’s food and these are so helpful. Initially bought one but had to order more! Easy to store and clean! The possibilities of what you can store are endless! A must have
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to freeze breast milk
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing breast milk. It has a line for 1 and 1.5 oz making it easy to portion out. The cubes are way to defrost in a bottle overnight. Can also use to make baby food!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Great....until it’s not.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. But after using it twice it already has a tear in it. I really had planned on ordering more but I’m disappointed now. So sad it tore with so little use. I can still use it just have to not use one of the portion cups so we will continue use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Herring

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby food freezer storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store my organic homemade baby food without BPA in the Product. I washed this quickly in super hot water and her dish soap rinse before use and it doesn’t even smell as some mentioned. Love the 1oz marking to know how much to store in each pod. They pop out easily for when I need one to feed baby. Does the job I need it to. Would and need to reorder another one.
customer_reviews.author: TigerMama81

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! I ordered 5. They are too expensive to order more... so I will be transferring the items to a zip lock bag to make a lot of baby food ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McLaury

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product... I’m very conscious about the safety of baby product and got this tray after a lot of research. However, after I washed in on warm water, there was a very strong rubber smell. Therefore I don’t feel comfortable putting my baby’s food in the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I love these trays! They are like the mythical unicorn I thought I'd never find. It is so easy to pop the food out of. I literally broke nails and contorted into bizarre positions to pop the food out of other trays. Not with weesprout! Freeze, pop, repeat. I'm like a well oiled machine with these trays. Do yourself a huge favor and buy a couple of these.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love these trays
customer_reviews.text: These things are AMAZING!! I knew from the beginning I wanted to make my little boys baby food, so when the time came I did a lot of research on freezing trays. Many reviews for other products complained of a chemical smell or the top not fitting right. So I was so happy when I stumbled upon these. They freeze great, I love how easily they stack in the freezer, and the pods of food easily pop out when frozen. LOVE LOVE LOVE!! Only complaint I've found is that the 2 middle sections take longer to freeze...I have no clue why, but it's done it with every food I've made
customer_reviews.author: J. York

product_meta.title: WEESPROUT Silicone Baby Food Freezer Tray with Clip-on Lid by WeeSprout - Perfect Storage Container for Homemade Baby Food, Vegetable & Fruit Purees and Breast Milk - BPA Free
product_meta.description: Color:BlueBABY FOOD STORAGE MADE SIMPLE & SAFE! Are you unsatisfied with processed baby food and ready to make your own? - Tired of spending too much on expensive pre-made baby food and worried about the quality of the ingredients?- Looking for a safe and simple way to store the food you have spent valuable time making? Nature's Little Cubes has been designed for you and your family!Save time and money by creating your own baby food in larger batches and storing it in the freezer.- Feel confident that the storage container will preserve the quality of the ingredients.- Easily pop out one serving at a time. Why our customers love our cube trays... Easy to use- Individual servings pop out easily- Hard plastic lid snaps on with ease and allows for convenient stacking of freezer trays. Each 1.5 oz section also has a 1 oz. mark for smaller servingsHealthy and Safe- Lid keeps frozen baby food fresh longer- Silicone is naturally bacteria, odor and stain resistant and free of BPA, PVC, lead, phthalate, and other toxinsVersatile- Tray and lid may be used in the freezer and are top rack dishwasher-safe- Tray may also be used in the microwave and oven (up to 425 F)- Tray may also be used for baking, for food storage or serving, or as a mold.High Quality Construction- Tray is made of premium food grade silicone- Lid is made of premium hard plastic- Both are very durable and covered by our lifetime guarantee Our freezer tray is backed by a lifetime, hassle-free guarantee! Click the 'Add to Cart' button at the upper right corner of this page to start enjoying a simple & safe way to store your baby food and breast milk!
feature_bullets: EASY TO USE: Individual servings pop out easily. Hard plastic lid snaps on with ease and allows for convenient stacking of freezer trays. Simply clean in dishwasher. Each 1.5 oz section also has a 1 oz. mark for smaller servings.

HEALTHY & SAFE: Lid keeps frozen baby food fresh longer. Silicone is naturally bacteria, odor and stain resistant. All of our products are free of BPA, PVC, lead, Phthalate, and other toxins, making them completely safe for babies.

VERSATILE: Tray and lid may be used in the freezer and are top rack dishwasher safe. Tray may also be used in the microwave and the oven (up to 425 F). Tray may also be used for baking, for food storage or serving, or as a mold.
HIGH QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Tray is made of premium food-grade silicone. Lid is made of premium hard plastic.
THE BEST GUARANTEE: Backed by a lifetime, hassle-free guarantee.
